text: Denson also known as Bear Island is an unincorporated community in Livingston Parish, Louisiana, United States. The community is located southeast of Maurepas and southwest of Killian north of the Blind River. ==History== A man named Callie Denson Moore founded the local post office and was appointed postmaster on June 8, 1903. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Livingston Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana
title: Denson, Louisiana
